title: sakala sampathpradhE
sahitya:
sakala sampatpradE shadchakra dEvatE



anupallavi



suka sanaka sEvitE sumukha SaNmukha mAtE



caraNam



sahasrAkSa sannutE saptakOTi manustutE sahasrAkSi shAntE salahau

 mAtE sahasra bhadrAsanE saccidAnanda ghanE sahasra shiRSe mudE sadaya

harikEshahitE
